name: Pilot Unknown
description: Pilot Unknown launches the roguelike into space. This bullet hell shooter consists of equal parts action and mystery. Hone your piloting skills to take down enemies; hone your strategic plan to take down the dungeon. You will need both to survive in Pilot Unknown.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Dual Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 compliant graphic cards DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: System must support 4096x4096 texture pages
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Quad Core CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 compliant graphic cards DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: System must support 4096x4096 texture pages
